MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G76 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to repair faulty equipment on our overhead line network  at Phillipshill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:12am on the 7th of November 2020.
